summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 HEARTLAND BIGHORN FIFTH WHEEL TRAILER, MODEL 3655.  WHILE DRIVING 55 MPH, THE WHEEL CRACKED AND BLEW OUT THE AMERICANA TIRES.  THE WHEELS PERFORM POORLY ON ROUGH ROAD CONDITIONS.  THE CONTACT FELT THAT THE WHEELS WERE UNSAFE BECAUSE THEY COULD BLOW OUT AT ANY TIME.  A NEAR CRASH OCCURRED DUE TO THE FAILURE.  THE MILEAGES WERE NOT APPLICABLE.
